SELECT INSPECTION_CATEGORY_ID, INSPECTION_CATEGORY_NAME,
DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_MS_USER_ID, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_INSPECTION_CATEGORY
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = False

INSERT INTO MS_INSPECTION_CATEGORY( INSPECTION_CATEGORY_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :INSPECTION_CATEGORY_NAME , :DELETE_FLAG , :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_INSPECTION_CATEGORY SET INSPECTION_CATEGORY_NAME = :INSPECTION_CATEGORY_NAME , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE INSPECTION_CATEGORY_ID = :INSPECTION_CATEGORY_ID
